src.gui
Class ItemShop

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      src.gui.ItemShop
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ItemShop
extends javax.swing.JFrame

All shops that sell items inherit from this class. You can select which item from the list you want to purchase and click buy. You can also try stealing and canceling. Implemented classes will have to specify what items the shop has and implement the buy method.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/10/07
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ItemShop

public ItemShop(Controller controller,
                Shops type,
                int permutation,
                int row,
                int col)
Constructor that sets up the controller, the shop type and the permutation number of the shop. It calls the setup method which will fill in the GUI based on the type and permutation of the shop.

Parameters:
controller - Controller : controller
type - Shops : type of shop
permutation - int : permutation number
